setupDescription: Set a passphrase to encrypt your passwords end-to-end.
passphraseMinLength: Passphrase must be at least 10 characters.
setupWarning: If you forget your passphrase, your saved passwords cannot be recovered. Please store it in a safe place.
accountLocked: Account temporarily locked due to too many failed attempts.
accountLockedWithTime: Account temporarily locked. Try again in {time}.
rateLimited: Too many attempts. Please wait a few minutes.
retryLater: Temporary server error. Please try again.
changePassphraseDescription: Update your vault passphrase. Your saved data will not be affected.
verifierNotSetHint: Please lock and unlock your vault once before changing your passphrase.
verifierVersionUnsupported: Please update the app to change your passphrase.
recoveryKeyBannerMessage: Set up a Recovery Key to protect against passphrase loss.
recoveryKeyDialogDescription: Generate a Recovery Key to recover your vault if you forget your passphrase.
recoveryKeyEnterPassphrase: Enter your current passphrase to generate a Recovery Key.
recoveryKeyGenerated: Your Recovery Key has been generated.
recoveryKeySavedConfirm: I have saved my Recovery Key in a safe place
recoveryKeyWarning: Store this Recovery Key in a safe place. You will need it to recover your vault if you forget your passphrase. This key will not be shown again.
recoveryKeyRegenerateWarning: You already have a Recovery Key. Generating a new one will invalidate the previous key.
